text: Peter Reichhardt (born 7 January 1967) is a Danish actor and theatre director. He is the son of actors Poul Reichhardt and Charlotte Ernst. He was the director of the Mungo Park in Lillerød from 1998 - 2005. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Film |- ! Year ! Title !
